duties_responsibilities.duty: Evaluate loans for credit risk through the review of I&E/cash flow and rent roll analysis, third party reports, loan structure, borrower credit worthiness, market analysis, asset quality, and final loan documents.
Provide analytical and market research support for the team and undertake additional ancillary projects as needed.
Ensure timely completion and delivery of Asset Summary Reports and Rating Agency/Investor Q&A to Capital Markets.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Real Estate, Finance, Economics, or related field (Master's preferred)
